The Accounting Directive in Article 3 used the term ‘average number of employees during the
financial year’. This is exactly the same term used in ESRS 1 Appendix C, aligning ESRS to the
wording and requirement used in the Accounting Directive. The Accounting Directive has been
transposed in the national laws of the Member States and it is expected that, based on this
